sentence.Network_en: "You don't have to go, you know," she said worriedly.
sentence.Network_cn: “你知道的，你不一定非得去。”她忧虑地说。

sentence.Network_en: " I wonder what to do,'she said worriedly; he paused worriedly before calling the bank.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 我不知道我能做什么, ” 她苦恼地说; 在打电话给银行之前,他苦恼地踌躇着.

sentence.Network_en: Cato worriedly dispatched the rest of the field hands off to their work.
sentence.Network_cn: 卡托忧心忡忡地打发其余的大田奴隶去干活.

07年考研英语真题解析_百度文库 ... “cheerfully” 意为“高兴地，愉快地” ； “worriedly” 意为“担心地，担忧地” ；.
" I wonder what to do ,' she said worriedly ; he paused worriedly before calling the bank .“我不知道我能做什么,”她苦恼地说;在打电话给银行之前,他苦恼地踌躇着.
Gretal looked worriedly at Hansel , but he gave her a big confident smile that calmed her down .葛蕾朵担心地看着汉梭，但他给她一个满怀信心的微笑使她安心下来。

entry.def: When you are worried, you are unhappy because you keep thinking about problems that you have or about unpleasant things that might happen in the future.

example.ex: If you're at all worried about his progress, do discuss it with one of his teachers...
example.tran: 如果你还有一点儿担心他的学业的话，一定要找一位教他的老师谈一谈。

sentences.sentence: "`I wonder what to do,' she said worriedly"
"he paused worriedly before calling the bank"

auth_sentence.content: He asked worriedly, Is Syria going to be like Iraq?
auth_sentence.res_content: He asked worriedly, Is Syria going to be like Iraq?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He asked worriedly, Is Syria going to be like Iraq?
